docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Many terms in Gen AI are loosy goosy, with no hard definitions, this is my attempt at making a useful dictionary Language Models Large Language Model (LLM): ... [[Frontier Model]] A top of the line LLM such as OpenAI's GPT-4o or Llama 3.1 405b. Anything larger than ~70b parameters [[Edge Model]] ~1b parameters to ~70b parameters Usage Examples Introducing the world’s best edge models... we are proud to introduce two new state-of-the-art models for on-device computing and at-the-edge use cases. We call them les Ministraux: Ministral 3B and Ministral 8B. - https://mistral.ai/news/ministraux/ Synonyms * [[Small Language Model]] ([[SLM]]) [[Small Language Model]] ([[SLM]]) Compared to a Large Language Model, a SLM typically has fewer parameters, allowing for faster processing and lower memory usage. However, it may not possess the same level of knowledge or context awareness as a Large Language Model due to its smaller size. Small Language Models are often used for specific tasks or applications where resource efficiency is crucial, or as a starting point for research before moving to larger models. Typically defined as ~1b parameters to ~70b parameters Usage Examples Even though I am quite happy with the new attention gained by Small Language Models, at the same time I feel disappointed. - https://generativeai.pub/battle-of-the-3b-small-language-models-in-the-arena-15d309ce0ba2 Mini Language Model ():
docs.title: Gen AI Dictionary
